  • Constructor Details

    • Information

      public Information​(DrawingSurface surface)
      Creates a new information screen on the given PApplet
      Parameters:
      surface - the PApplet on which the screen will be displayed

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw()
      Draws the information screen to the PApplet. This displays the instructions for the game and an exit button
      Overrides:
      draw in class Screen

    • processMouseClick

      public void processMouseClick​(int mouseX, int mouseY)
      Executes when the mouse is clicked. If the click is within the exit button, the provided DrawingSurface changes screen.
      Overrides:
      processMouseClick in class Screen
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the x-coordinate of the mouse click
      mouseY - the y-coordinate of the mouse click
      Postcondition:
      the provided DrawingSurface may be modified
